abstract: Scores of celebrities are in Hamptons for charity galas, including 19th annual Ovarian Cancer Searcher Fund Alliance.

headline.print_headline: From a Garage Sale to Art in the Woods
headline.main: Garage Sale and Art Auction in the Hamptons

snippet: Kelly Ripa and Donna Karan host the Super Saturday garage sale; Ja Rule performs to an art crowd at the Watermill Center gala....
lead_paragraph: Kelly Ripa and Donna Karan host the Super Saturday garage sale; Ja Rule performs to an art crowd at the Watermill Center gala.
